alert.note: Alert for Cochran; Hale; Hockley; Lamb; Lubbock; Terry; Yoakum (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:52PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lubbock, Cochran, northern Terry, Hockley, southwestern Hale, northern Yoakum and southeastern Lamb Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 550 PM CDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from 3 miles north of Abernathy to 4 miles west of Reese Center to 12 miles south of Lehman. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. Occasionally thick blowing dust and strong northwest winds up to 50 mph will precede these storms. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar and Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lubbock, Levelland, Morton, Wolfforth, Shallowater, Sundown, Anton, Ransom Canyon, Bledsoe, Lubbock South Plains Mall, Locketville, Slide, Woodrow, Reese Center, Bronco, Lubbock International Airport, Texas Tech University, Whitharral, Downtown Lubbock and Lehman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cochran; Hale; Hockley; Lamb; Lubbock; Terry; Yoakum
